name: Flying Dog Hero Crime City
description:
As Flying Dog hero comic grows up, he becomes the Earth's mightiest warrior in this open world gangster games and protects his adopted home planet from those who seek to harm it and want to make it throne battle tap. Flying dog mutant hero is depicted with higher power level as care free, cheerful and friendly when at ease, but quickly serious and strategic-minded when in throne battle tap.

Game Play:

While playing this Fictional Dog Fidget Hero game, our character will be hot dog comic and we’ll fight against the enemies superheroes like incredible monsters, shooters and hitters in this challenging spinner game of Flying dog Fidget Hero which is also fighting mafia wars game.
The marvellous thing of this Dog Fidget Hero game is that we can also use fidget spinner for gangster kill which is adventure spinner to attack on enemies like incredible super monsters and to complete the mission.

Features:

• Stealth mode and angry dog master battle style in shadows.
• Multiple weapons and action pack combat gameplay.
• Engaging Background music with HD graphics.
• Player Punch, Power ups, Pro Fidget Spinners and comic Combos.
• Realistic stealth and combat movements.


Your grand city is being held hostage by a group of deadly criminals ruffians in this open world gangster fighting mafia game! Use your dangerous fidget spinner as a weapon to ward them off, and save your family, friends, and mafia town from chaos. Emerge as the Fictional flying dog Fidget Hero Warrior superhero!


Tired of playing same old superhero games. If you are looking for a new kind of superheroes games, then wait no more. This super hero game introduces you to a brand new kind of amazing superhero or shall we say a Flying dog hero!!

Download Flying Superhero Dog Hero Crime City rescue mission now! Never before would you have seen such kind of crime fighter superhero games for kids, which is also one of the best dog games 2018. This dog hero games is a treat for fans of animal games. This flying superhero dog game is first of its kind. Become a flying dog superhero which can fly and has laser vision which you can use to battle crime. Do grand city rescue in city survival game.

In this superhero simulator you will do your battle against city crime as a flying superhero dog. This hero dog is a legendary crime fighter in grand city survival mission. As a New York superhero you will have do super rescue missions in survival city using fighting skills of flying hero games.

This is a fighting combat game where you will play the role of a flying heroes super hero dog. As a street fighter, dog hero of animal games, you have to do super city rescue mission. Do fly hero city escape in games for dogs. Get ready for deep doggy combat mission of crime battle in flying dog games simulator. Become monster smasher in city of heroes. Eliminate robbers and street gangsters from streets of New York city aka superhero city.

Show crime fighting skills of immortal superhero in this fighting games with superheroes. This is not your usual superhero fighting games. This is furious battle of grand city survival mission in flying superhero games for free. The futuristic city is invaded by Mafia robot cars and bikes. The futuristic Mafia robots war has just begun in survival city where this amazing robot transformation into robo dog will help you win the war. Take the risk of city survival rescue mission as Flying dog robot hero can transform into robot dog to fight in futuristic dog hero robots war in 2018 simulator.

We always love to hear from you to make this Flying dog crime city game better.
